Title: Aqua Shield
Feature: Creates a shield of water that absorbs damage.

Title: Tidal Surge
Feature: Deals water damage to enemies in a large area around the caster.

Title: Water Jet
Feature: Shoots a high-pressure jet of water at an enemy, knocking them back.

Title: Tidal Wave
Feature: Summons a wave to push enemies back and deal water damage.

Title: Frostbite
Feature: Deals ice damage and slows the enemy for a short period.
